sentences.en: Children who play truant from school are unimaginative.
sentences.cn: 逃学的孩子们都缺乏想像力.

sentences.en: He was reprimanded for playing truant.
How dared you to play truant!
I found the truant throwing stones in the river.
sentences.cn: 我发现那个逃课的学生在往河里扔石子.

sentences.en: I have been a truant of my time.
In my last year I played truant a lot.

sentences.cn: 逃学的孩子都缺乏想像力.

sentences.en: Little Boys who play truant from school are unimaginative.

sentences.en: Our institute is clamping down on those who often play truant.
sentences.cn: 我们学院正在严加惩处那些经常逃学的学生.

sentences.en: Peter was skinned for playing truant.
She interceded with the teacher for her son, who'd been playing truant.
sentences.cn: 她为逃学的儿子向老师讲情.

sentences.en: She was getting into trouble over playing truant from school.
The child was punished for playing truant.
The teacher supposed that the absent pupil was ill, but some of his friends suspected he was playing truant.
sentences.cn: 老师猜想那个没到的学生是病了, 但他的一些朋友怀疑他是逃学.

sentences.en: Those who often play truant are not flood students.
sentences.cn: 经常逃学的学生不是好学生.
